entry.title: [BIP/Draft] BIP Acceptance Process
entry.summary: In an email thread discussing a proposal, Luke Dashjr suggests that only hardforks should go through the hardfork process and softforks through the softfork process. He argues that trying to make a one-size-fits-all process would render de facto accepted BIPs unrecognized because nobody cares to meet the higher requirements. After this comment, Greg moves forward with the proposal and thanks everyone for the discussion.
